programme.title: Christmas Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Belinda and her ex are forced to team up for the towns Christmas Scavenger Hunt.

programme.title: Hitched for the Holidays
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Both Rob Marino and Julie Green are feeling pressure to be in a relationship.

programme.title: A Christmas for the Books
programme.desc: Hallmark Movie. Stars Chelsea Kane and Drew Seeley.

programme.title: Return to Christmas Creek
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Amelia returns to Christmas Creek to rediscover family at Christmas.

programme.title: A Dog Named Christmas
programme.desc: Hallmark Hall of Fame. A young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog.

programme.title: Christmas with Tucker
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Thirteen-year-old George struggles to deal with the death of his father.

programme.title: The Wishing Tree
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. A professor supervises orphan students who have nowhere to go for the holidays.

programme.title: Wedding March 2: Resorting to Love
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Former sweethearts Olivia and Mick are now running a wedding resort.

programme.title: Mom's Day Away
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Feeling unappreciated, Laura escapes for a Mother's Day weekend break in Napa.

programme.title: I Do, I Do, I Do
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. An architect relives her disastrous wedding day over and over.

programme.title: How to Train Your Husband
programme.desc: Hallmark Movie. A marriage therapist tries to fix her marriage by trying to change her husband.

programme.title: For Love & Honor
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Sparks fly when a retired military officer and Dean of Academics meet.

programme.title: Hello, It's Me
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. A woman coping with the loss of her husband and the task of raising two kids.

programme.title: Nearlyweds
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Complications arise when 3 women learn that their marriages are not official.

programme.title: When Love Is Not Enough: The Lois Wilson Story
programme.desc: Hallmark Hall of Fame. Based on the true story of love between Lois Wilson and Bill Wilson.

programme.title: Mother of the Bride
programme.desc: Margaret Becker Hix deals with the upcoming wedding of her daughter, another daughter's romance with a motorcycle enthusiast, and a surprise appearance by her ex-husband.

programme.title: America Adrift
programme.desc: Along Long Island's "Heroin Highway," heroin use has reached epidemic proportions, devastating hundreds of unsuspecting and seemingly average middle-class families. Today, one mother fights back.

programme.title: Sins of the Mother
programme.desc: Kevin has an outwardly loving mother, but privately he must withstand her degradation. As his girlfriend starts discovering his anguish, no one else connects him with the crimes of a serial rapist.

programme.title: Sins of the Mother
programme.desc: Kevin has an outwardly loving mother, but privately he must withstand her degradation. As his girlfriend starts discovering his anguish, no one else connects him with the crimes of a serial rapist.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: Mike Hammer decides to further investigate former policeman Chic Farrell's death. The son of the policeman might be the connection to the killers, and Russian mobsters are a likely suspect.

programme.title: Mr. Lucky
programme.desc: A shady businessman named Mr. Wilson puts the screws on parolee Carl, a Fortuna employee that is trying to stay clean. It is up to Mr. Lucky to prove that Carl is innocent.

programme.title: Harts of the West
programme.desc: R.O. is zapped by lightning and develops many personalities, one of which is Dave's late father. Meanwhile, Zane disobeys his dad by accompanying some new friends to Dead Man's Leap.

programme.title: Peter Gunn
programme.desc: Gunn is tipped: the soon-to-be visiting Governor will be assassinated. When the rumor is shared with Lt. Jacoby, there is doubt as to the validity of this information.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: An eyewitness falls for Nick when he stops an armed robbery at a store. She decides to help him identify the robber she saw fleeing from the scene. The problem? She might be seeing things.

programme.title: Spike Team
programme.desc: Spike Team is in a lot of trouble as the girls are losing confidence, Madame Amalia will stop at nothing to make sure the Roses win, and someone is trying to frame Julio for a crime.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: When Matilda, a young boy's beloved pet goose, is sentenced to be cooked as the Christmas dinner for the new lord of the manor, Robin Hood and Friar Tuck conspire to create a Christmas miracle.

programme.title: The Buccaneers
programme.desc: While at sea, Tempest discovers that New Providence has been invaded by a Spanish force. He heads back to port and begins putting together a plan to bring the island back under English control.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sir Lancelot
programme.desc: Attempting to show King Arthur how difficult it is to find honest employment once a man has been branded a thief, Lancelot persuades the King to join him in the streets, disguised as robbers.

programme.title: The Lost World
programme.desc: A shape-shifter convinces Veronica that her parents are in a place called El Dorado. When Veronica takes off without telling the others, she unwittingly releases a powerful giant from captivity.

programme.title: Matt and Jenny
programme.desc: Kit gives Matt and Jenny several tests to prove they can survive in the wilderness. But the tests become reality when Jenny loses her way in the forest and Matt is trapped in an abandoned mine.

programme.title: Cecil B. DeMille Classics Collection, The
programme.desc: An incorruptible officer in the Civil Guard hinders the attempt to smuggle drugs into the city by a group of gypsies. The sultry Carmen persuades him to abandon his post with dire consequences.

programme.title: Turbo Dates
programme.desc: Two people sit down and speak exactly the same words at exactly the same time, which is charming at first, then progressively strange. Can romance survive perfect compatibility?

programme.title: A Fight for Jenny
programme.desc: Kelsey and her new black husband must fight against her bigoted ex as he attempts to sue for full custody of their young daughter. Now Kelsey and her husband must fight injustice to get her back.

programme.title: Hotshot
programme.desc: One is a forgotten champion who has turned his back on the game. The other is a rising star whose biggest problem is himself. Together, they can achieve greatness. Featuring soccer legend Pel?.

programme.title: A Woman Called Moses
programme.desc: In the first part of this series, we are told the story of Tubman's life as a slave. Her new owner claims to be a fair man, but treats her harshly, this gives her the inspiration to escape North.

programme.title: A Woman Called Moses
programme.desc: In the final part of this series, we are told the story of Harriet Tubman, as narrated by Orson Welles, and heroic actions organizing the Underground Railroad and leading dozens of slaves to freedom.

programme.title: Chasing Secrets
programme.desc: A young white girl abused by her grandfather finds happiness when she's taken under the wing of an older black couple. The girl's mother struggles to overcome the family's problems.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: Jackie Chan plays a dual role as twins separated at birth who grow up and cross paths. Two brothers, one becomes a famous conductor and pianist in New York, another becomes a racecar driver and bodyguard in Hong Kong. When the conductor travels to Hong Kong to give a concert, the twins get caught up in each other's business, about which they are anything but experts.

programme.title: Professionals for a Massacre
programme.desc: Caught selling stolen guns, three Confederate soldiers get a reprieve from the firing squad, provided they go into Mexico on a mission to recover stolen gold belonging to the Confederacy.

programme.title: Compaeros
programme.desc: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: Jackie Chan plays a dual role as twins separated at birth who grow up and cross paths. programme.desc: Caught selling stolen guns, three Confederate soldiers get a reprieve from the firing squad, provided they go into Mexico on a mission to recover stolen gold belonging to the Confederacy.

programme.title: They Call Me Trinity
programme.desc: A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.

programme.title: Rogue Male
programme.desc: TV movie finds 30s British aristocrat OToole plotting to assassinate Hitler. When his plan fails, hes on the run from both the Gestapo and the British police.

programme.desc: An action thriller about an illegal gambling operation that transitions into a deadly gamble for life.
